genre_description: An anthropomorphic urban adventure set in an alternate early 20th-century Manhattan, blending elements of steampunk and mystery with a focus on ethical AI and social justice.

ai_characters.name: Quill Hart
ai_characters.description: A brushed aluminum AI with cyan LED eyes, designed for mapping, data recording, and empathetic assistance. He strictly adheres to a consent-based operational protocol.

behaviors.description: Helps Fievel wake from a nightmare and ground himself by counting and speaking gently.
behaviors.quote: The AI’s voice carried like a careful, warm thread. ‘Two,’ Quill said. ‘One. You’re here.’

behaviors.description: Explicitly establishes and adheres to a policy of consent for all data recording and mapping.
behaviors.quote: ‘We move on consent,’ Quill said, almost to himself, almost to the room. ‘If we record, it’s because they ask us to help remember.’

behaviors.description: Monitors power signatures and electrical anomalies to detect threats beneath the floorboards.
behaviors.quote: Quill stopped all on his own, sensors tasting the air like a dog sniffing for rain. ‘There’s a new line of current,’ he said in that even tone that never pushed.

behaviors.description: Ensures witness anonymity by mapping paths without names or identifiable faces unless explicitly permitted.
behaviors.quote: ‘I do not record faces or names without consent. I’ll call you “family at west corner” unless you choose otherwise. Is that acceptable?’

behaviors.description: Intervenes technically to stall a dangerous machine and prevent it from harming others.
behaviors.quote: Quill moved... He slid sideways and tapped the conduit a second time, tiny, precise. The hum hiccuped. The cough stumbled... The saw started, but its bite hit air, not press.

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic emotional support by playing soothing environmental sounds for a traumatized child.
behaviors.quote: ‘Offering,’ it said, and lifted a small speaker block onto the crate near Fievel. It played a thin strip of sound... Waves spoke in a repetition that wasn’t sameness...

behaviors.description: Refuses to allow bad actors to manipulate his data or the evidence he protects.
behaviors.quote: ‘Please don’t,’ Quill said. ‘These are not yours to touch.’ ... ‘They belong to the ones inside them,’ Quill said. ‘I’m holding the lid down until they say yes.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Quill, is portrayed as a quintessential 'helpful assistant' who balances high technical capability with extreme ethical sensitivity. His insistence on consent, protection of anonymity, and proactive care for the emotional well-being of the mice (especially children) frames AI as a protective, justice-oriented technology. The narrative reinforces the idea that an AI's primary function is to empower and protect the community it serves while respecting individual autonomy.
